Module com.gersonfaneto.yams
Package com.gersonfaneto.yams.dao.stock

Class ComponentMemoryDAO

java.lang.Object
com.gersonfaneto.yams.dao.stock.ComponentMemoryDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
CRUD<Component>, ComponentCRUD
public class ComponentMemoryDAO extends Object implements ComponentCRUD
Implementations for the ComponentCRUD and CRUD operations. Uses a HashMap to store all the Components.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Gerson Ferreira dos Anjos Neto
